dialogue.text: It's almost showtime! Have you two agreed on who will be performing tonight?
Ah, Sweet & Sour Summer Mix it is, then! It's 20 minutes till showtime, so let's hop to it.
You gotta be kidding... There is no way we're gonna make this work at all.
I-I'm just going to play what I had set already. I... don't know what you do, but... my shows are classical.
I play EDM beats that make people get up and dance. Mama just used classical to put me to sleep when I was younger.
Hrrrmph...- I've never even heard of 'Eee Dee Emm' before.
That's a damn shame. You and your fans are boutta be enlightened once I start.
